mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", q.id AS "shuntId.id", q.name AS "shuntId.name", q.kgbh AS "shuntId.kgbh", a.wattfulgross AS "wattfulgross", a.peaksegment AS "peaksegment", a.grainsegment AS "grainsegment", a.flatsegment AS "flatsegment", a.pluswatt AS "pluswatt", a.resewatt AS "resewatt", a.demnum AS "demnum", a.idleroll AS "idleroll", a.anti_reactive_power AS "antiReactivePower", to_char(a.time,'YYYY-MM') AS "time", a.lastbase AS "lastbase", a.nowbase AS "nowbase", a.days AS "days", a.lastpower AS "lastpower", a.abversionpoe AS "abversionpoe", a.demand AS "demand", a.insert_flag AS "insertFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join TMDL_POWER_SHUNT q on q.id=a.shunt_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tmdl_power( id, shunt_id, wattfulgross, peaksegment, grainsegment, flatsegment, pluswatt, resewatt, idleroll, anti_reactive_power, lastbase, nowbase, time, insert_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{shuntId.id}, #{wattfulgross}, #{peaksegment}, #{grainsegment}, #{flatsegment}, #{pluswatt}, #{resewatt}, #{idleroll}, #{antiReactivePower}, #{lastbase}, #{nowbase}, #{time}, #{insertFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tmdl_power SET shunt_id = #{shuntId.id}, wattfulgross = #{wattfulgross}, peaksegment = #{peaksegment}, grainsegment = #{grainsegment}, flatsegment = #{flatsegment}, pluswatt = #{pluswatt}, resewatt = #{resewatt}, idleroll = #{idleroll}, anti_reactive_power = #{antiReactivePower}, time = #{time}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select switchnumber as "switchnumber" , datadatetime as "datadatetime", dataproperty as "dataproperty", substationid as "substationid", R0p1 as "r0p1", R0p2 as "r0p2", R0p3 as "r0p3", R0p4 as "r0p4", R0p5 as "r0p5", R0p6 as "r0p6", R0p7 as "r0p7", R0p8 as "r0p8", R1p1 as "r1p1", R1p2 as "r1p2", R1p3 as "r1p3", R1p4 as "r1p4", R1p5 as "r1p5", R1p6 as "r1p6", R1p7 as "r1p7", R1p8 as "r1p8", R2p1 as "r2p1", R2p2 as "r2p2", R2p3 as "r2p3", R2p4 as "r2p4", R2p5 as "r2p5", R2p6 as "r2p6", R2p7 as "r2p7", R2p8 as "r2p8", R3p1 as "r3p1", R3p2 as "r3p2", R3p3 as "r3p3", R3p4 as "r3p4", R3p5 as "r3p5", R3p6 as "r3p6", R3p7 as "r3p7", R3p8 as "r3p8", R4p1 as "r4p1", R4p2 as "r4p2", R4p4 as "r4p4", R4p5 as "r4p5", R4p6 as "r4p6", R4p8 as "r4p8", ZDXL as "zdxl" from TMDL_D_BM_MID a where a.dataproperty=1 order by a.switchnumber,a.datadatetime desc

select MAX(a.DATADATETIME) first,MIN(a.DATADATETIME) next,a.SWITCHNUMBER as kgbh,a.SUBSTATIONID as stationid from TMDL_D_BM_MID a where to_char(a.DATADATETIME,'YYYY-MM')=#{time} GROUP BY a.SWITCHNUMBER,a.SUBSTATIONID
SELECT ID as "id",BDZID as "bdzid.id",name as "name" FROM TMDL_POWER_SHUNT WHERE KGBH=#{kgbh} and BDZID=#{stationid}
